casebody.data:
Craig S. VINCH, Petitioner/Appellant
v.
Helen M. PAPPA, Respondent. No. ED 105011 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FOUR. FILED: December 12, 2017
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied February 26, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied May 1, 2018 Nathan S. Cohen, St. Louis, MO, for appellant. Lisa Moore Alan E. Freed - co-counsel, Clayton, MO, for respondent. Before Colleen Dolan, P.J., Mary K. Hoff, J., and Lisa Van Amburg, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Craig Vinch appeals the trial court's dissolution judgment as to various awards in favor of his former spouse, Helen Pappa. We affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
